title: Question:
author: RoyaltyFinance
content: Royalty FinanceRoyalty Finance is an auto-staking and auto-compounding decentralised protocol, providing investors with an annual yield of 160,198%.Our forefront is to maintain a Sustainable rewards model, whilst also providing investors with Trust. Utilities will further build the $ROYAL ecosystem.Presale: 4th MayLaunchpad: Gempad£ CertiK Applied£ KYC + Doxed£ 600+ News Publications£ 30+ AMA’s£ Vigorous Marketing Campaigns£ Multiple KOL Networks2 Whitelist Spots to Giveaway!Rules:£ Join the Telegram & Discord£ Discuss the project in their chat£ Comment Done BelowWhitelist spots also available in their Gleam competition and other community giveaways.PARTNERSHIP ANNOUNCEMENTRoyalty Finance has officially partnered with GemPad and many other platformsOur presale will be hosted on these platforms on the 4th May.$ROYAL will be featured as a Diamond ranked sale, the highest available, with additional KYC and Audit status.We are excited to reveal further announcements as the partnership develops.Socials:Telegram I http://t.me/RoyaltyFinanceOfficialDiscord I https://discord.gg/royaltyfinanceTwitter I https://twitter.com/RoyaltyAPYWebsite I https://www.royaltyfinance.net/CertiK | https://www.certik.com/projects/royalty-finance

comments.author: kurniawan05
comments.body: what is your utility product that can generate income for your project? how can provide staking rewards if you have no product? i saw your selling/buying taxes are high.

comments.author: kurniawan05
comments.body: The decline in crypto prices has been quite large in the last few weeks, this has led to panic selling to reduce losses, but for some people they will survive by holding trusted coins/tokens. I tried to survive and move to a more trusted coin.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: RoyaltyFinance on May 09, 2022, 03:28:57 PMRoyalty FinanceRoyalty Finance is an auto-staking and auto-compounding decentralised protocol, providing investors with an annual yield of 160,198%.There are two things that confuse me. The first is the extremely high APY. How will such high payouts be maintained? When I see hundreds of thousands of percent, I immediately have a bad association with some kind of scam. I just do not remember any well-known project to offer such high rates. And second, I went to your website, tried to buy tokens, clicked the Buy Token button and nothing happens. I understand that this feature is not yet available and tokens can only be bought on the Gamepad?
